sub_title: Senior Legal Counsel at ACT Commodities Group
summary:
As Legal Counsel at ACT, I will focus on all the legal aspects related to our French subsidiary, which is a pioneer on the primary market for white certificates (CEE). I also assist our French desk here in Amsterdam on a daily basis, on the trade part of various certificates and GoOs. Do not hesitate to contact me if you are interested in the activity of ACT.

Solid professional, qualified and experienced French lawyer, with a proven track record of working on various legal issues (corporate, real estate, finance and civil law related) and M&A transactions.

Expertise in contract law, company law, civil litigation and cross-border transactions. Strong professional with an MBA focused on finance, management and accounting from ESSEC MBA.

Happy mother of 2.
